name: COMMANDOES
description: Combining various words yields interesting results sometimes and the after effects can create spectacular results. Take for instance, COMMADOES. All we did was add the "E" and immediately we have two separate words that are now together: Command & Does. If we investigate a little deeper we can find various words lurking. We can create a sentence like: AND DOES A MAN COMMAND? The overall main word reads like commandos, as in (A small fighting force specially trained for making quick destructive raids against enemy-held areas.). We could make the connection or inference with the sentence created to how the male dominated patriarchy of the world has cultivated men to be seen as uber-masculine and anything less is not considered "manly" enough. Imagine a world where men and women are seen as true equals? Let's teach our boys to be better men.
